text:
"Kanuites" is an extinct genus of paradoxurine viverrid carnivore. It lived in Africa, during the Miocene epoch.
Description.
"Kanuites" was about long, and looked very similar to modern genets. "Kanuites" was probably an omnivore and may have had retractable claws, like a feline. It may have lived in trees during some time in its life.
